title: ADCA
description: ADCA (Advanced Diploma in Computer Applications) is a comprehensive 12-month course covering computer fundamentals, MS Office, Tally, programming (C, OOPs), databases, web design, and more, preparing students for various IT jobs.

title: 'O' Level
description: A government-recognized foundation course by NIELIT covering IT tools, web design, Python programming, and IoT. Essential for many government job applications and a strong start in IT.
syllabus: Programming and Problem Solving through Python
Internet of Things (IoT) and its Applications

title: Tally with GST
description: Master professional accounting with Tally. Learn bookkeeping, GST compliance, inventory management, payroll, and taxation to become a job-ready accountant or Tally operator.
